Articles.Content:
I have previously downloaded 1 of these mods but i deleated it, and I CAN'T FIND IT ANYWHERE!

So can someone tell me of any mods containing stuff like hinges, pistons, that kind of thing.

Thanks in advance.
Magic Smoke Industries. I think that's it's name.

nope, I already checked, I will eventually download it, but.

any other mod?

just wanna make sure, thanks though.

The mod I maintain is called Infernal Robotics. Magic Smoke Industries is the "company name". The older version I forked it from was called Damned Robotics and the plugin will not work with the newer version of KSP.

Well alright i'll download it as soon as I can.

Thanks
